trans-unit.source: I received the error "KBXXXXXX requires a member of the Visual Studio 2015 family to be present or is blocked by another condition on your computer."
trans-unit.target: I received the error "KBXXXXXX requires a member of the Visual Studio 2015 family to be present or is blocked by another condition on your computer."

trans-unit.source:
You receive the error "KBXXXXXX requires a member of the Visual Studio 2015 family to be present or is blocked by another condition on your computer."

Resolution
trans-unit.target:
You receive the error "KBXXXXXX requires a member of the Visual Studio 2015 family to be present or is blocked by another condition on your computer."

Resolution

trans-unit.source: Try installing the latest Visual Studio installer to update your current version of Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: Try installing the latest Visual Studio installer to update your current version of Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: The latest version of Visual Studio can be found on the Visual Studio Downloads Site.
trans-unit.target: The latest version of Visual Studio can be found on the Visual Studio Downloads Site.
